author: danielsh
msg: Allow each XFail test to declare its associated issue.
(XFail.__init__): Add 'issues' attribute and pass it to TestCase.

author: dag
msg: DERBY-4741 Make embedded Derby work reliably in the presence of thread interrupts
It tests that an interrupt will stop a batch of statements by throwing
08000 just before we execute the next statement in the batch.

author: tabish
msg: Adds more error handling and attempt to better manage failures that occur during the prepare phase.
